sentence: A ticketed event on Thursday hosted by conservative political commentator Dave Rubin and starring Florida Governor Ron DeSantis was suddenly interrupted by gun control activists who tried to draw the governor's attention over the issue of gun safety.
author: Giulia Carbonaro
title: Ron DeSantis Event Disrupted by Florida Gun Control Activists
